channel.title: Where to make one? or how? rep++
channel.description: where can i make a support banner, and a banner for your rsps? one like this: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/9jeq1c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2i57qf.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/4596/41878990.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/fbw4s7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1132.photobucket.com/albums/m575/BlahBerrys/banner.png[/img] - [IMG]http://i1132.photobucket.com/albums/m575/BlahBerrys/dubscape.jpg[/img] - [IMG]http://i1132.photobucket.com/albums/m575/BlahBerrys/betasignup.jpg[/img] thats my favorite banners i have seen to now, i have not made them. so, does anyone know how or where i can make banners like these?

item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

yea you need to use some type of editing software. Most people use Photoshop to make banners and stuff theres free ways to get it on youtube with product keys. And if your wanting to make rs characters you need like a 3d software program like Blender 3d or iClone?
